}catch(error){var _error$response,_error$response$data;toast.error(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:(_error$response$data=_error$response.data)===null||_error$response$data===void 0?void 0:_error$response$data.error)||'Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>navigate('/signup'),children:"Sign up here"})]})]});};export default Login;
